Articles.Content:
Hey guys, as you can see from the image below, I made a Satellite type ship using mods, and it has a docking port on the nose. I have it in perfect orbit but now I want to get another one up to it and dock. 

Is there a mod that I can use to get it right next to my Satellite? because doing in by hand is extremely hard and almost impossible for me ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

![7152002573_60df3e88fc_c.jpg](http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7101/7152002573_60df3e88fc_c.jpg)

> 
> I have it in perfect orbit but now I want to get another one up to it and dock.

At the moment, you can\'t do that. It is an added feature that is not in the 'Vanilla' game yet. I think it is on the wiki.

> 
> Is there a mod that I can use to get it right next to my Satellite?...

Yes, Mechjeb is your best bet.

> 
> ...because doing in by hand is extremely hard and almost impossible for me ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

You may eventually have to use the controls. Nova (of NovaSilsko) is making a docking camera. You will have to check his thread for more information.

Hope you know understand a little more.

Boyercam

> 
> At the moment, you can\'t do that. It is an added feature that is not in the 'Vanilla' game yet. I think it is on the wiki.
> 
> Yes, Mechjeb is your best bet.
> 
> You may eventually have to use the controls. Nova (of NovaSilsko) is making a docking camera. You will have to check his thread for more information.
> 
> Hope you know understand a little more.
> 
> Boyercam

Thanks that was a big help ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

2 different things:

- Rendez-vous

- Docking

Right now, you can rendez-vous manually using the multiple methods that are covered in the 'How To' section of the forum. It\'s not necessarily hard, but it can take quite a while. The MechJeb or RinComp plugins help, but it can be done without them. There will be no docking cam from Nova.

Docking is not supported yet. You\'ll have to wait for 0.16 (if you prepaid for the game).
[This thread](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=9726.0) and video will get ya going.
Actually, he can dock, his ship is using the KAPAS\_75 mod
